Masters<S>2962</S>, give<S>3930</S> unto your servants<S>1401</S> that which is just<S>1342</S> and<S>2532</S> equal<S>2471</S>; knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> have<S>2192</S> a Master<S>2962</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Continue<S>4342</S> in prayer<S>4335</S>, and watch<S>1127</S> in<S>1722</S> the same<S>846</S> with<S>1722</S> thanksgiving<S>2169</S>;
Withal<S>260</S> praying<S>4336</S> also<S>2532</S> for<S>4012</S> us<S>2257</S>, that<S>2443</S> God<S>2316</S> would open<S>455</S> unto us<S>2254</S> a door<S>2374</S> of utterance<S>3056</S>, to speak<S>2980</S> the mystery<S>3466</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, for<S>1223</S> which<S>3739</S> I am<S>1210</S> also<S>2532</S> in bonds<S>1210</S>:
That<S>2443</S> I may make<S>5319</S> it<S>846</S> manifest<S>5319</S>, as<S>5613</S> I<S>3165</S> ought<S>1163</S> to speak<S>2980</S>.
Walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> wisdom<S>4678</S> toward<S>4314</S> them that are without<S>1854</S>, redeeming<S>1805</S> the time<S>2540</S>.
Let your<S>5216</S> speech<S>3056</S> be alway<S>3842</S> with<S>1722</S> grace<S>5485</S>, seasoned<S>741</S> with salt<S>217</S>, that ye may know<S>1492</S> how<S>4459</S> ye<S>5209</S> ought<S>1163</S> to answer<S>611</S> every<S>1538</S> man<S>1520</S>.
All<S>3956</S> my<S>1691</S> state<S>2596</S> shall<S>1107</S> Tychicus<S>5190</S> declare<S>1107</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, who is a beloved<S>27</S> brother<S>80</S>, and<S>2532</S> a faithful<S>4103</S> minister<S>1249</S> and<S>2532</S> fellowservant<S>4889</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>:
Whom<S>3739</S> I have sent<S>3992</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> for<S>1519</S> the same<S>846</S> purpose<S>5124</S>, that<S>2443</S> he might know<S>1097</S> your<S>5216</S> estate<S>4012</S>, and<S>2532</S> comfort<S>3870</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S>;
With<S>4862</S> Onesimus<S>3682</S>, a faithful<S>4103</S> and<S>2532</S> beloved<S>27</S> brother<S>80</S>, who<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> one of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S>. They shall make known<S>1107</S> unto you<S>5213</S> all things<S>3956</S> which<S>3588</S> are done here<S>5602</S>.
Aristarchus<S>708</S> my<S>3450</S> fellowprisoner<S>4869</S> saluteth<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> Marcus<S>3138</S>, sister's son<S>431</S> to Barnabas<S>921</S>, (touching<S>4012</S> whom<S>3739</S> ye received<S>2983</S> commandments<S>1785</S>: if<S>1437</S> he come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, receive<S>1209</S> him<S>846</S>;)
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, which<S>3588</S> is called<S>3004</S> Justus<S>2459</S>, who<S>3588</S> are<S>5607</S> of<S>1537</S> the circumcision<S>4061</S>. These<S>3778</S> only<S>3441</S> are my fellowworkers<S>4904</S> unto<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>, which<S>3748</S> have been<S>1096</S> a comfort<S>3931</S> unto me<S>3427</S>.
Epaphras<S>1889</S>, who is one of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S>, a servant<S>1401</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, saluteth<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>, always<S>3842</S> labouring fervently<S>75</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S> in<S>1722</S> prayers<S>4335</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye may stand<S>2476</S> perfect<S>5046</S> and<S>2532</S> complete<S>4137</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>. <sup>labouring: or, striving</sup> <sup>complete: or, filled</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I bear<S>3140</S> him<S>846</S> record<S>3140</S>, that<S>3754</S> he hath<S>2192</S> a great<S>4183</S> zeal<S>2205</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S>, and<S>2532</S> them that are in<S>1722</S> Laodicea<S>2993</S>, and<S>2532</S> them in<S>1722</S> Hierapolis<S>2404</S>.
Luke<S>3065</S>, the beloved<S>27</S> physician<S>2395</S>, and<S>2532</S> Demas<S>1214</S>, greet<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> the brethren<S>80</S> which are in<S>1722</S> Laodicea<S>2993</S>, and<S>2532</S> Nymphas<S>3564</S>, and<S>2532</S> the church<S>1577</S> which is in<S>2596</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> this epistle<S>1992</S> is read<S>314</S> among<S>3844</S> you<S>5213</S>, cause<S>4160</S> that<S>2443</S> it be read<S>314</S> also<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the church<S>1577</S> of the Laodiceans<S>2994</S>; and<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> <S>314</S> likewise<S>2532</S> read<S>314</S> the epistle from<S>1537</S> Laodicea<S>2993</S>.
And<S>2532</S> say<S>2036</S> to Archippus<S>751</S>, Take heed<S>991</S> to the ministry<S>1248</S> which<S>3739</S> thou hast received<S>3880</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou fulfil<S>4137</S> it<S>846</S>.
The salutation<S>783</S> by the hand<S>5495</S> of me<S>1699</S> Paul<S>3972</S>. Remember<S>3421</S> my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S>. Grace<S>5485</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>Written<S>1125</S> from<S>575</S> Rome<S>4516</S> to<S>4314</S> Colossians<S>2858</S> by<S>1223</S> Tychicus<S>5190</S> and<S>2532</S> Onesimus<S>3682</S>.</sup>
